Style object with APA style

style_apa.Rd

Style object with APA style

Usage

style_apa(
  x,
  family = "Times New Roman",
  font_size = 12,
  border_color = "black",
  border_width = 0.5,
  line_spacing = 2
)

# S3 method for class 'gt_tbl'
style_apa(
  x,
  family = "Times New Roman",
  font_size = 12,
  border_color = "black",
  border_width = 0.5,
  line_spacing = 2
)

# S3 method for class 'flextable'
style_apa(
  x,
  family = "Times New Roman",
  font_size = 12,
  border_color = "black",
  border_width = 0.5,
  line_spacing = 2
)

Arguments

x

object

family

font family

font_size

font size

border_color

border color

border_width

border width in pixels

line_spacing

spacing between lines

Value

object

Examples

d <- data.frame(x = 1:3, y = 4:6)
flextable::flextable(d) |>
  style_apa()

x
y
1
4
2
5
3
6
gt::gt(d) |>
  style_apa()
